title: LFP - Looking for players for ranked team
body:
Hello Summoners,
Due to a lot of trolls in solo queue, I have decided to create a team. Its just for fun only and improving myself and the team coordination.

If any one of you are interested to play for fun and improve overall gameplay then please message here. (Tier doesn't matter).

I am Plat 5 and pretty much play all roles but prefer top lane, but still I consider myself a player who needs a lot of improvement.

Team name - ForFunOnly
Tag - OFF

Looking forward to hear from other summoners who want to play in a team.

replies.body:
hey im on most nights IGN; TOMASTHET4NK

plat 5 supp main

hey im the same i took 2 months off solo q to improve my play style and looking for more ways to improve im a top lane main

champs: olaf,gnar,maokai,shen,lissandra,lulu,fiora and a few others

ign: pink blits
yo im keen to join I have 2 accounts that I play on both silver I main support/adc will be keen to join
Hi there, I am interested in joining your ranked team. I main adc/support and i would be willing to learn more about the game.
Glad you are interested. Add me IGN "dafaq"
